errors.name: UnspecifiedError
errors.msg: Unspecified Error

errors.name: DelegationStatusDoesNotPermitAction
errors.msg: DelegationStatus does not permit this action

errors.name: StatusDoesNotPermitAction
errors.msg: Status does not permit this action

errors.name: AccountNotOwnedByDelegationProgram
errors.msg: Account is not owned by the Delegation Program

errors.name: AccountNotOwnedByDelegationProgramOrThisProgram
errors.msg: Account is not owned by the Delegation Program or This Program

errors.name: IncorrectUpdateNonceProvided
errors.msg: Update Nonce provided is not the next in sequence

errors.name: OutOfSequenceUpdateProvided
errors.msg: An out of sequence update was provided

errors.name: AccountContextMismatch
errors.msg: The account context provided contains a mismatch

errors.name: SessionDurationBelowMinimumPermitted
errors.msg: The session duration is below the minimum permitted

errors.name: UnauthorizedAction
errors.msg: The ixn was not signed by the player_token's owner or session_authority

errors.name: CannotUndelegateInCurrentState
errors.msg: The account cannot be undelegated in it's current state

errors.name: InsufficientAvailableBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient available balance to support this action

errors.name: ReleaseExceedsExistingLockedAmount
errors.msg: The amount to be released exceeds the amount previously locked

errors.name: InconsistentNumberOfAllocatedAccountsUndelegated
errors.msg: The number of allocated accounts for undelegation was not consistent with the record

errors.name: AlreadyInList
errors.msg: The record is already in the list

errors.name: NotInList
errors.msg: The record is not in the list

errors.name: InvalidPermissions
errors.msg: The appropriate permissions were not present

errors.name: ValidationFailed
errors.msg: Validations failed

errors.name: MissingMethodForGame
errors.msg: Missing a method for this game

errors.name: MaximumBetsPerInstructionExceeded
errors.msg: Maximum number of bets per instruction exceeded

errors.name: InconsistentIxnBetCount
errors.msg: Specified number of bets and count of bets do not align

errors.name: OracleNotOnApprovedList
errors.msg: The responding oracle is not on the approved list

errors.name: CannotDelegateInCurrentState
errors.msg: Cannot delegate the account while there are open interactions to be settled against it

errors.name: RanomnessHasHDoesNotMatch
errors.msg: The randomness request hash does not match the account pubkey provided

errors.name: CannotCloseInstanceWithUnsettledBets
errors.msg: Cannot close an instance with unsettled bets

errors.name: OutOfSequenceInteraction
errors.msg: Response from oracle or player out of sequence

errors.name: FollowUpActionsNotProvider
errors.msg: The appropriate follow-up actions were not provided

errors.name: MethodDoesNotApplyToThisTypeOfGame
errors.msg: This method does not apply to this type of game

errors.name: BelowMinimumTransactionValue
errors.msg: The transaction has not reached the minimum value required

errors.name: BetAlreadySettled
errors.msg: This bet has already been settled

errors.name: MaximumTokensPerInstanceReached
errors.msg: The instance has reached it's maximum number of tokens

errors.name: MaximumBetsPerInstanceReached
errors.msg: The instance has reached it's maximum number of bets

errors.name: MaximumBetsPerInstanceTokenReached
errors.msg: The instance_token has reached it's maximum number of bets

errors.name: InstanceActiveWindowEnded
errors.msg: The instance's active window has ended

errors.name: InvalidOrPrematureOracleResponse
errors.msg: Invalid or premature oracle response

errors.name: AccountNotProvided
errors.msg: A required account was not provided

errors.name: TransferAccountsIssue
errors.msg: Issue with the accounts for transfers

errors.name: BetOutsideRiskTolerance
errors.msg: Bet outside risk tolerance

errors.name: DelegatedInstanceAccountNotEmpty
errors.msg: The delegated instance account must be empty before undelegation

errors.name: InvalidIxnForUpdateType
errors.msg: This it the wrong instruction for this update type

errors.name: PlayerTokenAccountCannotBeClosed
errors.msg: The PlayerToken account cannot be closed

errors.name: InstanceAccountNotEmpty
errors.msg: The instance account is not empty

errors.name: CannotClosePlayerTokenWithOpenUpdateSlip

errors.name: InstanceIdxOutOfOrder
errors.msg: InstanceIdxs used should be in sequence from 0...
